alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 10:28AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Grant County through 1100 AM CDT... At 1028 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Durango, or near Dubuque, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dickeyville around 1040 AM CDT. Cuba City around 1050 AM CDT. Platteville around 1055 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Kieler, Lock And Dam 11, Sandy Hook, Potosi, Louisburg, Platteville Airport, Big Patch, Tennyson, Georgetown and Cornelia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
